sub_phases.name: Phase 3.1: Containerization and Deployment Pipelines
sub_phases.objective: Dockerize the application and create Helm charts for deployment.

git.commit_message: feat(infra): Dockerize application and create Helm charts

tasks.prompt: Create a `Dockerfile` for the Python application.
Create a Helm chart in `charts/qdrant` for the vector store.
Create a Helm chart in `charts/app` for the agent application.

sub_phases.name: Phase 3.2: CI/CD and Observability
sub_phases.objective: Set up CI/CD with Google Cloud Build and implement basic observability.

tasks.prompt: Configure Google Cloud Build triggers to build images on git push.
Deploy Prometheus sidecars to scrape basic application metrics (latency, error rates).
